roleplaying

Class HitPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • roleplaying.HitPoint

  • public class HitPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has all the functionalities of Hit Points, that any game object would posses. Any object in a game like a gear, or a character should have hit points. Hit points consists of 2 things, the attack points and the defense points.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int attackPoints 
      private int defensePoints

      HitPoint(int attackPoints, int defensePoints)
      This constructor is used to set the values of attack points and defense points from the user.*

      int getDefensePoints()

      • addHitPoints

        public HitPoint addHitPoints(HitPoint hp)
        This method is used to add hit points of two objects.
        Parameters:
        hp - the hit points of the object passed as an argument
        Returns:
        the new hit point which is the sum of hit points of 2 objects
